definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
verdant/lush green and full of life
to fall headlong/(fig.) to suffer an ignominious failure

sentences.english: But Barbara Fick says stored onions need to be cured first.
sentences.chinese: 但芭芭拉说菲克存储葱需要先治愈。

sentences.english: Get the carrot, onion and garlic from the broth out and throw them out.
sentences.chinese: 把胡萝卜，葱和蒜从肉汤里取出来扔掉。

sentences.english: European leek cultivated and used like leeks.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲一种葱，常象冬葱一样栽培和应用。

sentences.english: Chili, pepper and shallot are usually necessaries in this division.
sentences.chinese: 辣椒，辣椒和葱，通常在这个司必需品。

sentences.english: Then throw in the garlic and scallions and sprinkle the thyme over the chicken.
sentences.chinese: 然后放入蒜和葱，并在鸡块上撒上百里香。

sentences.english: Why do not you steam those lobsters with ginger and scallion now ?
sentences.chinese: 你现在何不把那些龙虾和姜，葱一起蒸呢？

sentences.english: He sat by the fire, devouring beef and onions.
sentences.chinese: 坐火炉旁，狼吞咽吃着牛肉葱。

sentences.english: Add in shallots, parsley, egg, flour, salt and pepper to taste.
sentences.chinese: 加入葱酥，欧芹，鸡蛋，面粉以及适量盐胡椒。

sentences.english: Saute leek and pork liver with mango salsa is the special of this restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 葱炒猪肝佐芒果莎莎酱是这家店的招牌菜。

sentences.english: Adult fecundity was also investigated through continuous feeding the adults on milk solution with different IGRs.
sentences.chinese: 并且研究了葱蝇成虫取食药剂对其繁殖力的控制效应。

sentences.english: Wash and trim the scallion. Cut it into inch sections.
sentences.chinese: 胡萝卜和洋葱去皮洗净切成块状，葱洗净切寸段。

sentences.english: Add the mushrooms, ham, green pepper, celery, onions and parsley.
sentences.chinese: 加放蘑菇，火腿，绿甜椒，芹菜，葱和欧芹。

sentences.english: Sauteing onions and garlic will create a great aroma for Thai basil chicken.
sentences.chinese: 煸葱，蒜将创建一个伟大的泰国罗勒鸡肉香味。

sentences.english: I like eating onion and donut, what about you ?
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢吃葱和面圈，你呢？

sentences.english: Since DC and I don't eat spring onion, we used capsicum (green bell pepper) and lettuce instead.
sentences.chinese: 由于DC和我不吃葱，我们用了青椒和生菜代替。
